name: tranche
content:

finance & economics
  specialized one of several parts of a financial arrangement, payment, amount, etc.: Next month, they will sell a tranche of shares worth up to €500 million.

Add to word list
Add to word list
one of the parts into which a particular financial arrangement, payment, investment, etc. is divided: The oil company will pay $2.4 billion in cash up front, with three annual tranches of $1.25 billion to come. They will follow up last year's initial public offering with the sale of a further tranche of shares worth up to €500m.
